___$schema.description: Link to schema for this reference. That is a link to this very document. Typically used to identify what kind of reference this file is.
___$schema.title: Schema Reference

___description.description: Description of set of exchanges in markdown

___exchangePrefix.description: Prefix for all exchanges described in this document

___name.description: Name of exchange, this is a stable identifier for use in auto-generated client libraries

___schema.description: JSON schema for messages posted on this exchange

___required.description: True, if the key is always present, if `false` the value `_` will be used in place when no appropriate value is available for the key.

___summary.description: Short description of key in markdown

___multipleWords.description: True, if key may contain dots, which AMQP will consider as words. This determines if `#` or `*` should be used in client libraries

___constant.description: Constant to be used for this field, cannot be overwritten, only present if applicable.

___exchange.description: Exchange name on AMQP server, must be prefixed with `exchangePrefix` from this document.

___title.description: Title for set of exchanges in markdown
